events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was identified as a refund request related to receiving the wrong product in the order.
Customer support agent Mia has been assigned to handle this refund case for the customer.
Hello, I’m Mia from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for the wrong item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can process the refund?
Sure, my order number is 54321. I’ve attached a photo showing the item is not what I ordered originally.
Thank you for the information. I’ve approved a full refund which should be credited to your account within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and help with the refund. I appreciate how smoothly this is being handled.
The refund process has been initiated and the case is now resolved from our side. Please let us know if any further issues.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
Since the refund was successfully completed and you’ve confirmed satisfaction, the case is now officially closed.
